response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds immense value to me, but I am confident it will be a valuable addition to your collection. Given its significance and the fact that it's tailored to meet your specific needs, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both parties. Considering its worth to you, I propose a price of $11,000 for this product. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of us working together.", "product_price": 11000}
